posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.text: æ¥å…¥ç‚¹æ¨¡å¼ï¼šå¼€å‘æ¿ä½œä¸ºè·¯ç”±å™¨ï¼ˆç½‘å…³ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®©å…¶ä»–è®¾å¤‡è¿æ¥ æ— çº¿ç»ˆç«¯æ¨¡å¼ï¼šå¼€å‘æ¿ä½œä¸ºç»ˆç«¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¿æ¥è·¯ç”±å™¨WiFi è¯´æ˜ï¼šæ­¤å¤„ä½¿ç”¨ArduinoIDEæ¥è¿›è¡Œå¼€å‘ã€‚ æ³¨æ„ï¼šä¸Šä¼ ä»£ç å‰å¿…é¡»æŠŠâ€œä¸²å£ç›‘è§†å™¨â€ å…³é—­ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å¯èƒ½ä¸Šä¼ å‡ºé”™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºç«¯å£è¢«å ç”¨äº† 1ã€é…ç½®æ¥å…¥ç‚¹æ¨¡å¼å³å¼€å¯ â€œçƒ­ç‚¹â€ å¯¼å…¥ ESP8266WiFi.håº“ é…ç½®WiFiåç§°ï¼ˆssidï¼‰ã€å¯†ç ï¼ˆpasswdï¼‰â€”â€” softAP() 123const char ssid[] = "MyWiFi";const char passwd[] = "12345678";WiFi.softAP(ssid, passwd); è·å–å¼€å‘æ¿IP 1WiFi.softAPIP(); å®Œæ•´code 1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include <ESP8266WiFi.h>char ssid[] = "MyWiFi";char passwd[] = "1234567890";void setup(){ Serial.begin(9600); Serial.print("wifi ssid: "); Serial.println(ssid); Serial.print("wifi password: "); Serial.println(passwd); WiFi.softAP(ssid, passwd); //å¼€å¯æ¥å…¥ç‚¹æ¨¡å¼ Serial.print("IP Address: "); Serial.println(WiFi.softAPIP()); //æ‰“å°å¼€å‘æ¿çš„IP}void loop(){ } 2ã€é…ç½®æ— çº¿ç»ˆç«¯æ¨¡å¼åªæœ‰1ä¸ªWiFiå°†å¼€å‘æ¿è¿æ¥WiFi 123//ssidã€passwdå‡ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²WiFi.mode(WIFI_STA);WiFi.begin(ssid, passwd); å¤šæ¬¡å°è¯•è¿æ¥ï¼Œç›´åˆ°è¿æ¥ä¸Šï¼š 1234while(WiFi.status() != WL_CONNECTED ){ delay(1000); //....} è¿ä¸ŠWiFiåï¼Œè·å–wifiçš„ssidã€å¼€å‘æ¿IPåœ°å€ï¼š 12WiFi.SSID(); //è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²WiFi.localIP(); //è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸² å®Œæ•´codeï¼š 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526#include <ESP8266WiFi.h> // æœ¬ç¨‹åºä½¿ç”¨ESP8266WiFiåº“String ssid = "aaa"; String password = "12345678"; void setup() { Serial.begin(9600); WiFi.begin(ssid, password); int i = 0; while (WiFi.status() != WL_CONNECTED) { delay(1000); Serial.print(i++); Serial.print(' '); } Serial.println(""); Serial.print("Connecting to "); Serial.println(ssid); Serial.println("IP address: " ); Serial.println(WiFi.localIP()); }void loop() { } å¤šä¸ªWiFiï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨è¿æ¥æœ€å¼ºä¿¡å·çš„ å…ˆæ·»åŠ å‡ ä¸ªå¾…é€‰WiFi 1234567891011//å¯¼å…¥åº“#include <ESP8266WiFiMulti.h>// åˆ›å»ºESP8266WiFiMultiå¯¹è±¡ESP8266WiFiMulti wifiMulti; //é€šè¿‡addAP()å‡½æ•°å­˜å‚¨WiFiçš„ssidå’Œå¯†ç wifiMulti.addAP("aaaa", "11111111");wifiMulti.addAP("bbbb", "22222222");wifiMulti.addAP("cccc", "33333333"); å¤šæ¬¡å°è¯•è¿æ¥ï¼šwifiMulti.run() 12345 // å°†ä¼šè¿æ¥ä¿¡å·æœ€å¼ºçš„é‚£ä¸€ä¸ªWiFiä¿¡å·ã€‚while (wifiMulti.run() != WL_CONNECTED) { delay(1000); Serial.print('...'); } å®Œæ•´codeï¼š 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include <ESP8266WiFi.h>#include <ESP8266WiFiMulti.h>ESP8266WiFiMulti wifiMulti; //åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡void setup(){ Serial.begin(9600); wifiMulti.addAP("aaa", "12345678"); wifiMulti.addAP("bbb", "12345678"); wifiMulti.addAP("ccc", "12345678"); int i = 0; while (wifiMulti.run() != WL_CONNECTED){ delay(1000); Serial.print(++i); Serial.print(" "); } Serial.println(""); Serial.print("IP Address: "); Serial.println(WiFi.localIP()); }void loop(){}
